meta.name: layer_create
meta.purpose: Create a new audio layer (a channel where audio can be transferred).

desc.para: This command destroys an existing audio layer.
This command creates a new audio layer, where audio data can be sent or stored.

param.name: transfer
param.desc: The desired transfer mode to use for this subscription.

meta.purpose: Stop subscribing to an audio layer.
